summary: The young beloveds fight for their love in medieval Scandinavia.
cast: Oleg Vidov|Gitte Hænning|Eva Dahlbeck|Birgitte Federspiel|Lisbeth Movin|Johannes Meyer|Håkan Jahnberg|Manfred Reddemann|Henning Palner|Gisli Alfredsson|Folmer Rubæk|Borgar Garðarsson|Jörgen Lantz|Frederik Tharaldsen|Sisse Reingaard|Gunnar Björnstrand|Niels Hinrichsen|Else Højgaard|Jakob Nielsen|Poul Reichhardt
title: Den røde kappe
